transcript.title: Helping our kids become great readers
transcript.content:
This time of year parents are rushing around packing pencil cases, backpacks and lunchboxes getting their kids ready for the first days of the school year.

The Government is working to achieve improvements in literacy and numeracy skills for Australian children by investing in our school infrastructure and providing the resources that teachers and parents need to improve literacy outcomes.

This is an important issue and your thoughts are valuable - join the conversation on the Prime Minister's Children's Literacy Blog from 12pm Tuesday 2 February.
